snippet: ADAMS--Berenice (Halperin), 98, of Great Neck, NY on July 10th at home. Predeceased by husband Stanley Adams, President of ASCAP for 24 years and son Andrew Levin. Dearly loved. Survived by her son John Levin, and granddaughters Elizabeth and Kati...
lead_paragraph: ADAMS--Berenice (Halperin), 98, of Great Neck, NY on July 10th at home. Predeceased by husband Stanley Adams, President of ASCAP for 24 years and son Andrew Levin. Dearly loved. Survived by her son John Levin, and granddaughters Elizabeth and Katie and several nieces and nephews. She was an exceptional Interior Designer before retiring. 1/3
